title: Stand by me
creator_credit: Columbia Pictures, ACT III Communications, Andrew Scheinman, Bruce A. Evans, Raynold Gideon and Rob Reiner
brief_description: In the summer of 1956, four youths set out on a two-day trek through the woods surrounding their home-town of Castle Rock, Oregon, to find the undiscovered body of a dead teenager reported missing for several days. Their adventure is filled with humour and suspense as they learn about friendship and growing up. Starring River Phoenix, Wil Wheaton, Corey Feldman, Kiefer Sutherland, John Cusack and Richard Dreyfuss.
